data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: What I can see from the black and white picture is an old man who is around 60 years old sitting on a chair in front of a giant stone wall. The man is naked to his waist and wears a pair of pants and a pair of sneakers. He has got a number of tattoos on the top half of his body. Beside him on the bench, there is a bottle of drink and a bag, which indicates that he probably is having a rest. He is leaning his back onto the wall behind him, looking pretty chilled. (100字)
